T02D3552:187b-1: ma h'a s'a ra sva t'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3552:187b-3: dbyangs can ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3552:187b-4: 'phags ma dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3552:187b-5: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas 'dir stong pa nyid
T02D3552:188a-0: ji srid mngon du byas shing gnas nas chu @188a
T02D3552:188a-1: * // skyes dkar po khru bdun gyi tshad tsam /
T02D3552:188a-2: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D3552:188a-3: de'i dbus su dhr'i:yig dkar po /
T02D3552:188a-4: de las chu skyes dkar po la rang gi sa bon gyi snying po can bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3552:188a-5: de las yang bcom ldan 'das ma dbyangs can ma chen mo rjes su bsam par bya'o //
T02D3552:188a-6: ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od kyi rnam pa can /
T02D3552:188a-7: chu skyes dkar po la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa /
T02D3552:188a-8: phyag g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa /
T02D3552:188a-9: g-yon pa sdong bu dang bcas pa'i chu skyes dkar po bsnams pa /
T02D3552:188a-10: zhal 'dzum zhing shin tu brtse ba'i bdag nyid can /
T02D3552:188a-11: tsandan dkar po dang me tog gi na bza' man bas pa /
T02D3552:188a-12: mu tig gi do zhal gyis thugs ka nye bar
T02D3552:188a-13: mdzes pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang
T02D3552:188a-14: ldan pa lo bcu gnyis kyi rnam pa can /
T02D3552:188a-15: nu ma 'bur zhing nang rgyas pa /
T02D3552:188a-16: rked pa byin gyis phra ba /
T02D3552:188a-17: nang nas 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro bas 'jigs rten gsum po snang bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D3552:188a-18: de nas de'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab ma'o //
T02D3552:188a-22: 'di rnams rang gi gtso mo dang sku mdog la sogs pa mtshungs shing /
T02D3552:188a-23: zhal mngon par phyogs pas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D3552:188a-24: de nas rang gi lte ba'i phyogs su zla ba'i
T02D3552:188a-25: dkyil 'khor la aom yig dkar po bsgoms nas de
T02D3552:188a-26: las byung ba'i dag gi rang bzhin ma lus pa'i
T02D3552:188a-27: phreng ba bar mchad pa rab tu 'bab bzhin pa
T02D3552:188a-28: bsams nas sngags kun nas bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3552:188a-30: aom hr'i:mah'a m'a yam ge ma h'a sva ra sva
T02D3552:188a-31: tye na ma:de bzhin du gso sbyong blangs nas mi
T02D3552:188a-32: smra bar gnas nas rgyun du lha'i nga rgyal dang
T02D3552:188a-33: bcas pas sngags bzlas shing las gzhan mi byed pas
T02D3552:188a-34: zla ba gcig gis dbyangs can ma'i ngag thob par
T02D3552:188a-35: 'gyur ro // zla ba gsum gyis tshangs par spyod pa nyams pas kyang 'grub po //
T02D3552:188a-36: zla ba drug gis dbyangs can ma dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes so //
T02D3552:188a-37: de nas sman brjod par bya ste /
T02D3552:188a-44: rgya mtshan rnams mar la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas 'thungs na /
T02D3552:188b-0: dbyangs can @188b ma'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D3552:188b-2: mar bcug nas ni bco bar bya //
T02D3552:188b-3: blo ldan mi ni ngal 'jam gyis //
T02D3552:188b-4: sman ni chos pa tsam gyis so //
T02D3552:188b-5: zla ba gcig tsam rab sbyor bas //
T02D3552:188b-6: bla med dag ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D3552:188b-7: zla ba drug tu las sgyor bas //
T02D3552:188b-8: ngag gi dbang phyag mngon gsum 'gyur //
T02D3552:188b-9: khu byug myos pa'i dbyangs dang ldan //
T02D3552:188b-10: snyan pa'i dbyangs ni skye 'gyur te //
T02D3552:188b-11: sems nyid bsgoms pa'i nus pa yis //
